title: Lady Gaga pays tribute to Ozzy Osbourne during San Francisco concert
author: ByNBC Bay Area staff
content: As the death of Ozzy Osbourne continues to be felt by fans across the world, Lady Gaga paid tribute to the heavy metal legend during a concert at Chase Center in San Francisco."We'll miss you, Ozzy," Gaga could be heard telling the crowd Tuesday night.Watch NBC Bay Area News free wherever you areWATCH HEREGaga also wore an Ozzy Osborne shirt to end the show.Osborne, the former lead singer of Black Sabbath, died Tuesday just weeks after his farewell show. He was 76 years old.Celebrity NewsJul 22‘An absolute rock god': Music world reacts to the death of Ozzy OsbourneIn MemoriamJul 22Heavy metal legend Ozzy Osbourne dies at 76Get a weekly recap of the latest San Francisco Bay Area housing news with the Housing Deconstructed newsletter.SIGN UP
